thread.section_title: Security Camera Warehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Security Camera Warehouse | www.security-camera-warehouse.com
thread.title: Ken McDonough
thread.title_full: Security Camera Warehouse reviewed by Ken McDonough

author: Ken McDonough
title: Ken McDonough
text:
I purchased the wrong camera over the internet (my system was older). When I called, SCW quickly shipped me the correct camera and took the incorrect one back. No questions asked.
There was a conflict (IP address?) when I switched cameras around. Tech support solved it quickly. Very good company to deal with.
